definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: They are too conscientious and responsible to drive like manias .
sentences.chinese: 婦女格外謹慎，責任心也強，不會像狂人一樣開飛車。

sentences.english: To you, Gemini's are irresponsible and unworthy of your dedication.
sentences.chinese: 雙子座人通常缺乏責任心，並不值得你付出一切。

sentences.english: Those who are recl posty to help others have responsibility .
sentences.chinese: 樂於助人的人有責任心。

sentences.english: They are very experienced and responsible.
sentences.chinese: 他們富有經驗和責任心。

sentences.english: Raising a pet is a good way to make the child kind-hearted and responsible.
sentences.chinese: 飼養寵物是一種好讓孩子有善良和有責任心的好方法。

sentences.english: Job fervency high , has intense sense of responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 工作熱情高，有強烈的責任心。

sentences.english: High sense of work responsibility and devotedness.
sentences.chinese: 高度的工作責任心和敬業精神。

sentences.english: I think that enhance young people's sense of responsibility is the positive solution.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得提升年青人的責任心纔是正解。

sentences.english: So I can only suppose he wanted to train me to the responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 因此我只能猜想他是要培養我的責任心。

sentences.english: Want to be the head of sales of petroleum products. Initiative, responsible, communicative.
sentences.chinese: 想成爲成品油銷售主管，主動，有責任心，健談。

sentences.english: Hardworking and eager to learn Strong responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 爲人勤懇好學，有一定的責任心。

sentences.english: A strong sense of responsibility, careful, serious-minded, pays attention to materials saving.
sentences.chinese: 責任心強，工作細心，認真負責，注重材料的節約。

sentences.english: The class should choose a responsible pupil to take care of its money.
sentences.chinese: 班上應該選出一位有責任心的學生來管理班費。

sentences.english: The recipe recipient transiently made the conscientious alien client unconscious.
sentences.chinese: 烹飪法接受者瞬變使有責任心的外國人客戶無意識。

sentences.english: Ability to work self-responsible with active attitude, good communication skills.
sentences.chinese: 工作態度積極主動，善於溝通，有責任心。

sentences.english: On the other hand, music preferences didn't say much about whether a person was conscientious or not.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，音樂喜好不能說明一個人是否有責任心。

definition: to take care of one's family
to take responsibility/to bear responsibility/to be responsible
